Texts.Eng:
Personable cat-people. Light on their feet and quick to regain their stamina, they excel in close quarters despite their frailty, and are hardened against the forces of nature.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Omnivore, can eat raw meat.

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  +^green;10^reset;% Jump, Fall Damage x^green;0.8^reset;, +^green;5^reset;% Speed
  -^green;20^reset;% E. Regen Block Time
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;20^reset;% Fire, Electric, Ice and Poison

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Fist: +^green;2^reset;% Crit Chance, +^green;5^reset;% Crit Damage
  Shortsword/Dagger: Damage x^green;1.1^reset;, Defense x^green;1.05^reset;

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;20^reset;% Physical, Shadow, Cosmic and Radiation
